title: Align map with clickable states, add colored map background, and update website name

requirements.text: Update the website name from the current name to 'SahityaAurShabd' in all visible locations including the header logo, page titles, and any branding elements
acceptanceCriteria: The header logo displays 'SahityaAurShabd' instead of the current website name
Page title and metadata reflect 'SahityaAurShabd' as the website name
All branding elements consistently show the new name

requirements.text: Add a colored map of India as a background image behind the clickable state/UT cards in the IndiaMap component, ensuring the physical map outline aligns spatially with the interactive card positions

quotes: color the map as the background

acceptanceCriteria: A colored India map image is rendered as a background layer in the IndiaMap component
The map's state boundaries visually align with the corresponding clickable state/UT card positions
The background map enhances geographic recognition without interfering with card interactivity
The map colors complement the existing warm color palette

requirements.text: Refine the positioning of clickable state/UT cards in the IndiaMap component to precisely align with their corresponding geographic regions on the background India map

quotes: align the map with the clickable states

acceptanceCriteria: Each state/UT card is positioned directly over its corresponding region on the background map
The spatial arrangement accurately reflects India's geography
Cards do not overlap incorrectly or appear disconnected from their geographic locations
The alignment works responsively across different screen sizes

constraints: Maintain the existing IndiaMap component structure with clickable cards for all 37 regions
Preserve the warm, culturally appropriate color palette defined in the design system
Do not modify immutable frontend paths including useInternetIdentity, useActor, main.tsx, and UI components
nonGoals: Changing the backend data model or API structure
Modifying the poet profile page layouts
Redesigning the overall website theme or color system

required: Colored political map of India showing all 29 states and 8 union territories with distinct warm colors for each region, state boundaries clearly marked, without labels or text overlays, optimized for use as a background layer (india-map-background.dim_1200x800.png)
